ReportSection.title: FEC Decision Regarding Merit
ReportSection.ReportItem:
This is to inform you that the Faculty Evaluation Committee (FEC) has approved the award of a {getText(RP_FEC_TABLE, TABLE, INCREMENT, {$user_id}, 1, 0)} incrementation for you, rather than the {getText(RP_CHAIR, FEC_REVIEW, INCREMENT, {$user_id}, 0, 0)} incrementation recommended by your Department Chair.

Each year, the FEC is charged with the responsibility of awarding incrementation to its faculty, from an increment pool that is currently equal to 1.2 x the number of eligible staff within the Faculty. This decision was made within the context of the relative performance of your colleagues of similar rank.

FEC would like to thank you for your contributions to the Faculty in the past year and wishes you well in the coming year.
